scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start -w @holochain-open-dev/hrea-modeler"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/happ/hrea-modeler-test.happ --run=$HC_PORT network  --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack workdir/dna
scripts.docs:setup: npm run -w @holochain-open-dev/hrea-modeler analyze && cp ui/custom-elements.json docs/_assets/_static
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:setup && rocket build && gh-pages --dotfiles -d ./_site -b gh-pages
